title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: Bug 10022 describes an issue with the enablement of the "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective. Even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification", the build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This seems to be incorrect behavior.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Open a file or project in the Java perspective.
5. Right-click to open the context sensitive popup menu.
6. Verify that the "Build" action is still enabled and present in the menu.
